SELECT TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYY-MM-DD') TO_DAY A.SCHDUL_ID, A.SCHDUL_SE, A.SCHDUL_DEPT_ID, A.SCHDUL_KND_CODE, TO_CHAR(A.SCHDUL_BEGINDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')SCHDUL_BGNDE, TO_CHAR(A.SCHDUL_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')SCHDUL_ENDDE, A.SCHDUL_NM, A.SCHDUL_CN, A.SCHDUL_PLACE, A.SCHDUL_IPCR_CODE, A.SCHDUL_CHARGER_ID, A.ATCH_FILE_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.REPTIT_SE_CODE FROM LETTNSCHDULINFO A WHERE 1=1 AND A.SCHDUL_KND_CODE = '2' AND (A.SCHDUL_CHARGER_ID = #{uniqId} OR A.FRST_REGISTER_ID = #{uniqId})
AND ( ( SUBSTRING(A.SCHDUL_BEGINDE,1,8) > TO_CHAR(NOW(),'YYYYMMDD') AND SUBSTRING(A.SCHDUL_BEGINDE,1,8) <= TO_CHAR(NOW(),'YYYYMMDD')) OR ( SUBSTRING(A.SCHDUL_ENDDE,1,8) >TO_CHAR(NOW(),'YYYYMMDD') AND SUBSTRING(A.SCHDUL_BEGINDE,1,8) <= TO_CHAR(NOW(),'YYYYMMDD')) )
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC LIMIT 0, 4

SELECT A.SCHDUL_ID, A.SCHDUL_SE, A.SCHDUL_DEPT_ID, A.SCHDUL_KND_CODE, TO_CHAR(A.SCHDUL_BEGINDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI')SCHDUL_BGNDE, TO_CHAR(A.SCHDUL_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI')SCHDUL_ENDDE, A.SCHDUL_NM, A.SCHDUL_CN, A.SCHDUL_PLACE, A.SCHDUL_IPCR_CODE, A.SCHDUL_CHARGER_ID, A.ATCH_FILE_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.REPTIT_SE_CODE, (SELECT USER_NM FROM LETTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.SCHDUL_CHARGER_ID) USER_NM FROM LETTNSCHDULINFO A WHERE 1=1 AND A.SCHDUL_KND_CODE = '2'
AND (#{searchMonth} BETWEEN SUBSTRING(TO_CHAR(A.SCHDUL_BEGINDE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 6) AND SUBSTRING(TO_CHAR(A.SCHDUL_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 6) )
AND ( ( SUBSTRING(TO_CHAR(A.SCHDUL_BEGINDE, 'YYYYMMDD'),1,8) >= #{schdulBgnde} AND SUBSTRING(TO_CHAR(A.SCHDUL_BEGINDE, 'YYYYMMDD'),1,8) <= #{schdulEndde}) OR ( SUBSTRING(TO_CHAR(A.SCHDUL_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDD'),1,8) >= #{schdulBgnde} AND SUBSTRING(TO_CHAR(A.SCHDUL_BEGINDE, 'YYYYMMDD'),1,8) <= #{schdulEndde}) )
AND (#{searchDay} BETWEEN SUBSTRING(TO_CHAR(A.SCHDUL_BEGINDE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 8) AND SUBSTRING(TO_CHAR(A.SCHDUL_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 8) )
AND SCHDUL_SE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}), '%')
AND SCHDUL_SE = #{schdulSe}

SELECT A.SCHDUL_ID, A.SCHDUL_SE, A.SCHDUL_DEPT_ID, (SELECT ORGNZT_NM FROM LETTNORGNZTINFO WHERE ORGNZT_ID = A.SCHDUL_DEPT_ID) SCHDUL_DEPT_NAME, A.SCHDUL_KND_CODE, TO_CHAR(A.SCHDUL_BEGINDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI')SCHDUL_BGNDE, TO_CHAR(A.SCHDUL_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI')SCHDUL_ENDDE, A.SCHDUL_NM, A.SCHDUL_CN, A.SCHDUL_PLACE, A.SCHDUL_IPCR_CODE, A.SCHDUL_CHARGER_ID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM LETTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.SCHDUL_CHARGER_ID) SCHDUL_CHARGER_NAME, A.ATCH_FILE_ID, A.REPTIT_SE_CODE, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM LETTNSCHDULINFO A WHERE 1=1 AND SCHDUL_ID = #{schdulId}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM LETTNSCHDULINFO WHERE 1=1
AND SCHDUL_SE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}), '%')
mapper.update: UPDATE LETTNSCHDULINFO SET SCHDUL_SE=#{schdulSe}, SCHDUL_DEPT_ID=#{schdulDeptId}, SCHDUL_KND_CODE=#{schdulKindCode}, SCHDUL_BEGINDE=TO_TIMESTAMP(SUBSTRING(#{schdulBgnde}, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTRING(#{schdulBgnde}, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTRING(#{schdulBgnde}, 7, 2) || ' ' || SUBSTRING(#{schdulBgnde}, 9, 2) || ':' || SUBSTRING(#{schdulBgnde}, 11, 2), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI'), SCHDUL_ENDDE=TO_TIMESTAMP(SUBSTRING(#{schdulEndde}, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTRING(#{schdulEndde}, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTRING(#{schdulEndde}, 7, 2) || ' ' || SUBSTRING(#{schdulEndde}, 9, 2) || ':' || SUBSTRING(#{schdulEndde}, 11, 2), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI'), SCHDUL_NM=#{schdulNm}, SCHDUL_CN=#{schdulCn}, SCHDUL_IPCR_CODE=#{schdulIpcrCode}, SCHDUL_CHARGER_ID=#{schdulChargerId}, ATCH_FILE_ID=#{atchFileId}, REPTIT_SE_CODE=#{reptitSeCode}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = NOW(), LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE SCHDUL_ID = #{schdulId}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LETTNSCHDULINFO ( SCHDUL_ID, SCHDUL_SE, SCHDUL_DEPT_ID, SCHDUL_KND_CODE, SCHDUL_BEGINDE, SCHDUL_ENDDE, SCHDUL_NM, SCHDUL_CN, SCHDUL_PLACE, SCHDUL_IPCR_CODE, SCHDUL_CHARGER_ID, ATCH_FILE_ID, REPTIT_SE_CODE, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #{schdulId}, #{schdulSe}, #{schdulDeptId}, #{schdulKindCode}, TO_TIMESTAMP(SUBSTRING(#{schdulBgnde}, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTRING(#{schdulBgnde}, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTRING(#{schdulBgnde}, 7, 2) || ' ' || SUBSTRING(#{schdulBgnde}, 9, 2) || ':' || SUBSTRING(#{schdulBgnde}, 11, 2), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI'), TO_TIMESTAMP(SUBSTRING(#{schdulEndde}, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTRING(#{schdulEndde}, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTRING(#{schdulEndde}, 7, 2) || ' ' || SUBSTRING(#{schdulEndde}, 9, 2) || ':' || SUBSTRING(#{schdulEndde}, 11, 2), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI'), #{schdulNm}, #{schdulCn}, #{schdulPlace}, #{schdulIpcrCode}, #{schdulChargerId}, #{atchFileId}, #{reptitSeCode}, NOW(), #{frstRegisterId}, NOW(), #{lastUpdusrId} )
